unnormalised: Arrey yaar, these injury updates are killing me! Hope Sharma recovers soon. Remember that knee injury he got during the Ranji Trophy?
normalised: Arrey yaar, these injury updates are killing me! Hope Sharma recovers soon. Remember that knee injury he got during the Ranji Trophy?

unnormalised: Is he back to full fitness after training at the NCA?
normalised: Is he back to full fitness after training at the N C A?

unnormalised: He needs to be in top form for the upcoming series in Mohali.
normalised: He needs to be in top form for the upcoming series in Mohali.

unnormalised: Get well soon, buddy! We need those sixes!
normalised: Get well soon, buddy! We need those sixes!
